DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim is to evaluate if PSH and/or ultrapro mesch reduces chronic groin pain postoperatively compared to lichtenstein mesh. The second aim is to evaluate quality of life, recovery from surgery and frequency of recurrencies in the three groups
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Study Comparing Three Different Techniques for Open Hernia Repair
